title: Ukraine Talks Set to Resume, Following a Huge Attack by Moscow
summary_full: U.S., Russian and Ukrainian negotiators are meeting in the United Arab Emirates, but Russia continues to pummel Ukraine and has not softened demands that Kyiv calls unacceptable.
summary_public: U.S., Russian and Ukrainian negotiators are meeting in the United Arab Emirates, but Russia continues to pummel Ukraine and has not softened demands that Kyiv calls unacceptable.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: Russia continues to pummel Ukraine and has not softened demands

UA.label: positive
UA.evidence: Ukrainian negotiators are meeting... Kyiv calls unacceptable
